verses.verse: גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֵ֭לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מִשְׁלֵ֣י <S%H4912><s%> These [are] also proverbs שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הֶ֝עְתִּ֗יקוּ <S%H6275><s%> copied out אַנְשֵׁ֤י ׀ <S%H376><s%> the men חִזְקִיָּ֬ה <S%H2396><s%> of Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

כְּבֹ֣ד <S%H3519><s%> [It is] the glory אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> of God הַסְתֵּ֣ר <S%H5641><s%> to conceal דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> a thing וּכְבֹ֥ד <S%H3519><s%> but the honour מְ֝לָכִ֗ים <S%H4428><s%> of kings חֲקֹ֣ר <S%H2713><s%> [is] to search out דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> a matter

שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> The heaven לָ֭רוּם <S%H7312><s%> for height וָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the earth לָעֹ֑מֶק <S%H6011><s%> for depth וְלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> and the heart מְ֝לָכִ֗ים <S%H4428><s%> of kings אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> else חֵֽקֶר׃ <S%H2714><s%> [is] unsearchable

הָג֣וֹ <S%H1898><s%> Take away סִיגִ֣ים <S%H5509><s%> the dross מִכָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> from the silver וַיֵּצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> and there shall come forth לַצֹּרֵ֣ף <S%H6884><s%> for the finer כֶּֽלִי׃ <S%H3627><s%> a vessel

הָג֣וֹ <S%H1898><s%> Take away רָ֭שָׁע <S%H7563><s%> the wicked לִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> [from] before מֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וְיִכּ֖וֹן <S%H3559><s%> shall be established בַּצֶּ֣דֶק <S%H6664><s%> in righteousness כִּסְאֽוֹ׃ <S%H3678><s%> and his throne

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתְהַדַּ֥ר <S%H1921><s%> Put not forth לִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> thyself in the presence מֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king וּבִמְק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> not in the place גְּ֝דֹלִ֗ים <S%H1419><s%> of great אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעֲמֹֽד׃ <S%H5975><s%> and stand

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> For better אֲמָר־ <S%H559><s%> [it is] that it be said לְךָ֗ עֲ‍ֽלֵ֫ה <S%H5927><s%> unto thee Come up הֵ֥נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here מֵֽ֭הַשְׁפִּ֣ילְךָ <S%H8213><s%> hither than that thou shouldest be put lower לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> in the presence נָדִ֑יב <S%H5081><s%> of the prince אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> Whom רָא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> have seen עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> whom thine eyes

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> Go not forth לָרִ֗ב <S%H7378><s%> to strive מַ֫הֵ֥ר <S%H4118><s%> hastily פֶּ֣ן <S%H6435><s%> Otherwise מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what תַּ֭עֲשֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> lest [thou know not] what to do בְּאַחֲרִיתָ֑הּ <S%H319><s%> in the end בְּהַכְלִ֖ים <S%H3637><s%> hath put thee to shame אֹתְךָ֣ <S%H853><s%> רֵעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7453><s%> thereof when thy neighbour

רִֽ֭יבְךָ <S%H7378><s%> Debate רִ֣יב <S%H7379><s%> thy cause אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with רֵעֶ֑ךָ <S%H7453><s%> with thy neighbour וְס֖וֹד <S%H5475><s%> not a secret אַחֵ֣ר <S%H312><s%> to another אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּגָֽל׃ <S%H1540><s%> [himself] and discover

פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or יְחַסֶּדְךָ֥ <S%H2616><s%> [it] put thee to shame שֹׁמֵ֑עַ <S%H8085><s%> Lest he that heareth וְ֝דִבָּתְךָ֗ <S%H1681><s%> and thine infamy לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תָשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> turn not away

תַּפּוּחֵ֣י <S%H8598><s%> [is like] apples זָ֭הָב <S%H2091><s%> of gold בְּמַשְׂכִּיּ֥וֹת <S%H4906><s%> in pictures כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver דָּ֝בָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> A word דָּבֻ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spoken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> right אָפְנָֽיו׃ <S%H655><s%> circumstances

נֶ֣זֶם <S%H5141><s%> [As] an earring זָ֭הָב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וַחֲלִי־ <S%H2481><s%> and an ornament כָ֑תֶם <S%H3800><s%> of fine gold מוֹכִ֥יחַ <S%H3198><s%> reprover חָ֝כָ֗ם <S%H2450><s%> [so is] a wise עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אֹ֥זֶן <S%H241><s%> ear שֹׁמָֽעַת׃ <S%H8085><s%> upon an obedient

כְּצִנַּת־ <S%H6793><s%> As the cold שֶׁ֨לֶג ׀ <S%H7950><s%> of snow בְּי֬וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the time קָצִ֗יר <S%H7105><s%> of harvest צִ֣יר <S%H6735><s%> messenger נֶ֭אֱמָן <S%H539><s%> [so is] a faithful לְשֹׁלְחָ֑יו <S%H7971><s%> to them that send וְנֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> the soul אֲדֹנָ֣יו <S%H113><s%> of his masters יָשִֽׁיב׃ <S%H7725><s%> him for he refresheth פ

נְשִׂיאִ֣ים <S%H5387><s%> [is like] clouds וְ֭רוּחַ <S%H7307><s%> and wind וְגֶ֣שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> without rain אָ֑יִן <S%H369><s%> without אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Whoso מִ֝תְהַלֵּ֗ל <S%H1984><s%> boasteth בְּמַתַּת־ <S%H4991><s%> gift שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> himself of a false

בְּאֹ֣רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> By long אַ֭פַּיִם <S%H639><s%> forbearing יְפֻתֶּ֣ה <S%H6601><s%> persuaded קָצִ֑ין <S%H7101><s%> is a prince וְלָשׁ֥וֹן <S%H3956><s%> tongue רַ֝כָּ֗ה <S%H7390><s%> and a soft תִּשְׁבָּר־ <S%H7665><s%> breaketh גָּֽרֶם׃ <S%H1634><s%> the bone

דְּבַ֣שׁ <S%H1706><s%> honey מָ֭צָאתָ <S%H4672><s%> Hast thou found אֱכֹ֣ל <S%H398><s%> burn up דַּיֶּ֑ךָּ <S%H1767><s%> so much as is sufficient פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> you not תִּ֝שְׂבָּעֶ֗נּוּ <S%H7646><s%> for thee lest thou be filled וַהֲקֵֽאתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6958><s%> therewith and vomit

הֹקַ֣ר <S%H3365><s%> Withdraw רַ֭גְלְךָ <S%H7272><s%> thy foot מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house רֵעֶ֑ךָ <S%H7453><s%> from thy neighbour's פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or יִ֝שְׂבָּעֲךָ֗ <S%H7646><s%> lest he be weary וּשְׂנֵאֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8130><s%> of thee and [so] hate

מֵפִ֣יץ <S%H4650><s%> [is] a maul וְ֭חֶרֶב <S%H2719><s%> and a sword וְחֵ֣ץ <S%H2671><s%> arrow שָׁנ֑וּן <S%H8150><s%> and a sharp אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> A man עֹנֶ֥ה <S%H6030><s%> that beareth בְ֝רֵעֵ֗הוּ <S%H7453><s%> against his neighbour עֵ֣ד <S%H5707><s%> witness שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> false.

שֵׁ֣ן <S%H8127><s%> tooth רֹ֭עָה <S%H7465><s%> [is like] a broken וְרֶ֣גֶל <S%H7272><s%> and a foot מוּעָ֑דֶת <S%H4154><s%> out of joint מִבְטָ֥ח <S%H4009><s%> Confidence בּ֝וֹגֵ֗ד <S%H898><s%> in an unfaithful man בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in time צָרָֽה׃ <S%H6869><s%> of trouble

מַ֥עֲדֶה <S%H5710><s%> [As] he that taketh away בֶּ֨גֶד ׀ <S%H899><s%> a garment בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> weather קָ֭רָה <S%H7135><s%> in cold חֹ֣מֶץ <S%H2558><s%> [and as] vinegar עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on נָ֑תֶר <S%H5427><s%> upon nitre וְשָׁ֥ר <S%H7891><s%> so [is] he that singeth בַּ֝שִּׁרִ֗ים <S%H7892><s%> songs עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and לֶב־ <S%H3820><s%> heart רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> to an heavy פ

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If רָעֵ֣ב <S%H7456><s%> famish שֹׂ֭נַאֲךָ <S%H8130><s%> If thine enemy הַאֲכִלֵ֣הוּ <S%H398><s%> to eat לָ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> give him bread וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if צָ֝מֵ֗א <S%H6771><s%> and if he be thirsty הַשְׁקֵ֥הוּ <S%H8248><s%> to drink מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> give him water

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for גֶֽחָלִ֗ים <S%H1513><s%> coals of fire אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> you חֹתֶ֣ה <S%H2846><s%> For thou shalt heap עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> upon his head וַֽ֝יהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God יְשַׁלֶּם־ <S%H7999><s%> shall reward לָֽךְ׃

ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wind צָ֭פוֹן <S%H6828><s%> The north תְּח֣וֹלֵֽל <S%H2342><s%> driveth away גָּ֑שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> rain וּפָנִ֥ים <S%H6440><s%> countenance נִ֝זְעָמִ֗ים <S%H2194><s%> so [doth] an angry לְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> tongue סָֽתֶר׃ <S%H5643><s%> a backbiting

ט֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [It is] better שֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to dwell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in פִּנַּת־ <S%H6438><s%> in the corner גָּ֑ג <S%H1406><s%> of the housetop מֵאֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> woman [מִדֹונִים כ] (מִ֝דְיָנִ֗ים <S%H4066><s%> brawling ק) וּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house חָֽבֶר׃ <S%H2267><s%> and in a wide

מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters קָ֭רִים <S%H7119><s%> [As] cold עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> soul עֲיֵפָ֑ה <S%H5889><s%> to a thirsty וּשְׁמוּעָ֥ה <S%H8052><s%> news ט֝וֹבָ֗ה <S%H2896><s%> so [is] good מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country מֶרְחָֽק׃ <S%H4801><s%> from a far

מַעְיָ֣ן <S%H4599><s%> fountain נִ֭רְפָּשׂ <S%H7515><s%> [is as] a troubled וּמָק֣וֹר <S%H4726><s%> spring מָשְׁחָ֑ת <S%H7843><s%> and a corrupt צַ֝דִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> A righteous מָ֣ט <S%H4131><s%> man falling down לִפְנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> before רָשָֽׁע׃ <S%H7563><s%> the wicked

אָ֘כֹ֤ל <S%H398><s%> to eat דְּבַ֣שׁ <S%H1706><s%> honey הַרְבּ֣וֹת <S%H7235><s%> much לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [It is] not good וְחֵ֖קֶר <S%H2714><s%> so [for men] to search כְּבֹדָ֣ם <S%H3519><s%> their own glory כָּבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> [is not] glory

עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> [is like] a city פְּ֭רוּצָה <S%H6555><s%> [that is] broken down אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> into without חוֹמָ֑ה <S%H2346><s%> [and] without walls אִ֝֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> He אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who אֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> has מַעְצָ֣ר <S%H4623><s%> that [hath] no rule לְרוּחֽוֹ׃ <S%H7307><s%> over his own spirit
